law.catch_line: By resolution of its board of directors, an authority may provide for the issuance of:...
law.text:
By resolution of its board of directors, an authority may provide for the issuance of:
Refunding bonds to refund any bonds of the authority that were issued under this subtitle and are outstanding; or
A single issue of bonds to:
Pay the cost of a project or of the improvement, extension, or reconstruction of or additions to a project; and
Refund bonds that:
Were issued under this subtitle and are outstanding; and
Have matured, are subject to redemption, or can be retired.
